mapper.insert: INSERT INTO story_board(storyNum, memberId, storyCnum, storyTitle, storyContent, storyCreated, storyThumbnail) VALUES(story_board_seq.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, story_category_seq.NEXTVAL, #{storyTitle}, #{storyContent}, SYSDATE, #{storyThumbnail})
mapper.select: SELECT storyNum, s.memberId, storyCnum, storyTitle, storyContent, storyCreated, storyThumbnail FROM story_board s JOIN member_detail m ON s.memberId = m.memberId ORDER BY storyNum DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{rows} ROWS ONLY
